commit.message:
Fix dead e-mail address in ChangeLogs

From-SVN: r179728

files.patch:
@@ -45,15 +45,15 @@

-2008-12-15  Mikael Morin  <mikael.morin@tele2.fr>

 	in the pointer case.
 	(gfc_check_dependency): Use gfc_is_data_pointer.
